ygData.subject: Bard chains (was PoA bard quests plus a rant)
ygData.msgSnippet: I was in Sol A last night camping the foreman and predator to try and get either an obsidian scimitar or shard (got the shard).  At 32d level, almost all the
ygData.messageBody:
I was in Sol A last night camping the foreman and predator to try and get
either an obsidian scimitar or shard (got the shard). At 32d level, almost
all the regular spawns in those two rooms conned green to me. I got chains
to stick around 75% of the time against the green mobs. I would say that if
you don't have a ranger or druid to cast ensnare, it would take a bard in
their high 20s to reliably chain goblins in the initial portions of Sol A.

Galtin of E'ci
32 bard

> Anyhow, from my experience no ranger = no Sol A or Guk until your bard is
> 23rd minimum.
>
